name: stats_from_bam
usage: stats_from_bam [-h] [--bed BED] [-m MIN_LENGTH] [-a] [-o OUTPUT] [-s SUMMARY] [-t THREADS] bam
description: Parse a bamfile (from a stream) and output summary stats for each read.

options.description: show this help message and exit
.bed file of reference regions to include. (default: None)
Include secondary and supplementary alignments. (default: False)
Output alignment stats to file instead of stdout. (default: <_io.TextIOWrapper name='<stdout>' mode='w' encoding='utf-8'>)
Output summary to file instead of stderr. (default: <_io.TextIOWrapper name='<stderr>' mode='w' encoding='utf-8'>)
Number of threads for parallel processing. (default: 1)
